rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious entrance with a foyer leading to an open living area that adheres to Vastu principles for positive energy flow. Features include modern decor and ample lighting.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Modern dining space with sufficient seating capacity. The layout is designed to maintain a sense of community for the joint family.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Fully equipped modern kitchen with an open-plan design. It maintains connectivity with the dining area and living space, aligning with Vastu principles for cooking areas.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom with essential amenities designed for visitors. Ensures privacy and adheres to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Accessible bathroom serving the ground floor living areas. Designed with modern fixtures and water-saving features.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with attached bathroom and walk-in closet. Designed to promote privacy and relaxation, with Vastu-compliant positioning.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2
rooms.description: A comfortable bedroom for family members, ensuring privacy while maintaining connectivity with other living spaces.

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed to cater to the joint family setup, balancing space and functionality.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated home office with ample natural light. Positioned for productivity while ensuring minimal distractions from household activities, following Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Utility Room & Storage
rooms.description: Dedicated space for utilities, storage and laundry. Designed to be efficient while adhering to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Guest Bathroom
rooms.description: Additional bathroom facility serving the lower level for ease of access during family gatherings or guests staying on the ground floor.
